mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEMBER (user_num, name, id, pw, tel, email, birth) VALUES (user_num.nextval, #{name}, #{id}, #{pw}, #{tel}, #{email} , TO_DATE(#{birth},'YYYY-MM-DD'))
mapper.select: SELECT name, id, pw, tel, email, TO_CHAR(BIRTH,'YYYY-MM-DD'), authority FROM MEMBER WHERE delete_yn = 'N' ORDER BY user_num
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MEMBER WHERE delete_yn = 'N'
